transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I'm not a car. I often go to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I'm big and yellow!
🛑 I stop to pick up kids.
🏫 I take you to learn!

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: ➿ You need balance to ride me.
🔔 I might have a bell to ring.
🚳 I'm great for a park!

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to faraway places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I'm bigger than a bird.
✈️ I have wings and engines.
💺 You need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry lots of passengers. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a specific path.
🚂 I have many carriages.
⏱️ You need a timetable to catch me.

transport.question: I sail on the water and can be very big. Pirates like me.

hints.text: 🌊 I float on the ocean.
⚓ I might have a sail.
🚢 I can carry cargo or people.

transport.question: I can go anywhere, on or off road, and have four wheels.

hints.text: 🛣️ I am very common.
👪 I can carry a family.
⛽ I need petrol.

transport.question: I can take you high above the city, but I'm not an airplane. I often hang from a cable.

hints.text: 🏙️ I can be found in cities.
🚠 I carry people over distances.
🏔️ You might find me in the mountains.

transport.question: I zoom through space and take astronauts to the moon and beyond.

hints.text: 🧑‍🚀 I carry people into space.
🚀 I am very fast.
🌌 I explore new worlds.

transport.question: I’m like a train, but I run on roads and get power from a cable above. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I usually run in city centers.
⚡ I often have a pole that connects to an overhead wire.
🛤️ I might share the road with cars.

transport.question: I travel underwater, but I'm not a fish. I can explore the depths of the ocean.

hints.text: 🤿 I can go very deep.
🟡 I am shaped like a tube.
🐠 I can see underwater creatures.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce in the garden, but I also live in the ocean.
🐌 I am not an insect but I move slowly like some insects.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats float on top of me.
🐳 Many animals live in me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squeeze through small spaces.
🎨 I can change my color to blend in.
🦾 I have no bones.

ocean.question: I am a fish with a very flat body. What am I?

hints.text: 🪞 I look like I've been flattened by a pancake maker!
👁️ Both of my eyes are on the same side of my body.
🏖️ I like to hide in the sand at the bottom of the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean and sings. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I communicate with others by singing.
🐳 I am one of the biggest animals on Earth.
🌊 I breathe air, but I live in the water.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I come in many different colors and patterns.
🏠 I like to live in a coral reef for protection.
🐠 I'm small and swim in schools.

ocean.question: I am a creature that looks like a plant, but is actually an animal. I have tentacles that sting. What am I?

hints.text: 🚫 Don't touch me, I can sting!
💐 I look like a flower under the sea.
🌊 I float in the water.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with lots of sharp teeth. Some people are afraid of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator in the ocean.
🦷 My teeth are very sharp for eating other fish.
🌊 I swim very fast.

ocean.question: I am a long, thin fish that looks like a snake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 People sometimes confuse me with a snake.
🌊 I have no scales.
🔦 I hide in dark places in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a small creature with a hard shell and ten legs, often found scuttling sideways on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I walk sideways.
💪 I have claws.
🏖️ You might find me hiding under a rock on the beach.
